Text: Temptation was an Australian game show which premiered on the Nine Network on 30 May 2005.

Text: Temptation (Australian game show):  Hosted by Ed Phillips and Livinia Nixon, the show was a remake of "Sale of the Century", which aired on Nine in the same timeslot for more than twenty years between 1980 and 2001.

Text: Temptation (Australian game show):  This statement was accurate, as "Temptation" returned for a shortened fourth series from 1 December 2008 with unaired episodes which were recorded during 2008.

Text: Temptation (Australian game show):  After 23 January 2009, when the show's final episode aired, all "Temptation" websites were removed, and "Two and a Half Men" returned to Channel Nine's 7:00pm schedule.
